snippet: Trixton won the Hambletonian, beating Nuncio by a half-length in the $1.2 million race for 3-year-old trotting colts and geldings at the New Meadowlands Racetrack in East Rutherford, N.J.
abstract: Trixton wins $1.2 million Hambletonian harness race for 3-year-old trotting colts and geldings.
lead_paragraph: Trixton won the Hambletonian, beating Nuncio by a half-length in the $1.2 million race for 3-year-old trotting colts and geldings at the New Meadowlands Racetrack in East Rutherford, N.J.

headline.main: Trixton Stages an Upset at the Hambletonian
headline.print_headline: Trixton Stages an Upset at the Hambletonian
